pr_title: Add maxpending which by default is 1000 to control max inflight.

timeline.message: Add maxpending which by default is 1000 to control max inflight.

timeline.bodyText: Usage message is not updated, and order is inconsistent with option array.
timeline.author: toregge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1313,6 +1318,7 @@ App::get_options()
     enum longopts_enum {
         LONGOPT_CLIENT_THREADS,
         LONGOPT_INDEXING_SEQUENCER,
+        LONGOPT_MAX_PENDING,

replies.bodyText: "documents" is before  "max-pending" in long_opts array, thus LONGOPT_MAX_PENDING should be after LONGOPT_DOCUMENTS in longopts_enum.
replies.author: toregge

replies.bodyText: Now they should all be in alphabetical ordering.
replies.author: baldersheim

timeline.message:
Add description of max-pending parameter, and keep ordering.

Must have consistent ordering

Add description of max-pending parameter, and keep ordering.

Must have consistent ordering
